mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbl_user ( account, password, name, email, nickname, birthday, gender, created_at, updated_at, status, auth ) VALUES (#{account}, #{password}, #{name}, #{email}, #{nickname}, #{birthday}, #{gender}, #{createdAt}, #{updatedAt}, #{status}, #{auth})
mapper.select: SELECT account, password, name, email, nickname, birthday, gender, created_at as createdAt, updated_at as updatedAt, status, auth FROM tbl_user WHERE account = #{account}
